title: Understanding and Utilizing Deep Learning-Based Visible Light Wearable Eye Trackers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Students participate in real-time video classes using personal devices (BYOD) while learning mathematical principles of eye-tracking technology and AI application cases

learning_goals: Can explain the mathematical principles of YOLO model-based pupil tracking
Can interpret deep learning object detection results in terms of pixel error margins
Can calculate performance evaluation metrics (accuracy, recall) for visible light eye-tracking systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
